attributes.action: Introduce legislation to protect boats and houseboat dwellers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislation for the protection of boat and houseboat or floating home dwellers is urgently needed.

Over 150.000 people in England alone, live  and reside full time on board their boats, houseboats or floating homes.

Legislation for the;

* Housing Rights for boat or houseboat dwellers.

* Protection, security and safety for boat, houseboat and floating home dwellers.
